Energy Law

We advice clients in the industries of hydrocarbons, renewable energies and electricity regarding their specific legal framework, for the achievement of their business in Mexico, from the moment of set-up, participation in public contracts, energy biddings, governmental relations and solution of controversies.

Our team has deep understanding of the corresponding regulation, and is aware of the continuously changing legal energy framework not only in our country, but also worldwide, being able to provide effective solutions to specific inquiries and offering avant-garde solutions.

Hydrocarbons (Petrochemical and Natural Gas Industries)

Anaya Abogados offers consulting services during the development and structuring of investment projects in the hydrocarbons industry in Mexico, both for national and foreign companies.

Read more






Power Industry (Electricity)

Regarding the power industry, Anaya Abogados offers counseling to companies that are in public bidding procedures, public tenders, negotiations and execution of contracts, as well as assistance in the solution of controversies.

Read more
